评论用户: Amazing product recommend to everyone. It was easy to install in shower. Once I swap it out to new one I see everything that gets accumulated from the water. Water feels fresh and I’m not worried anything bad on my body.

I was prepared to be underwhelmed by this product, but it has a nice heavier weight fabric, nice lace, lays nicely on the body, and is very adjustable. I’m 57, and have to walk with awareness, as the hem is just at my feet and it could be a trip hazard if you weren’t paying attention. Lovely product.

I got so many compliments on this costume! I added a floral crown and went for a dark elf, scary fairy queen vibe, but I could have easily gotten a witch hat as well. After dragging it through leaves trick or treating, I was able to wash it!

评论概述: Could have easily been a four or five star
评论详情: Overall this dress looks as expected and the fabric is of good quality. The fit was slightly larger than expected and I may have been able to get away with one size smaller. The dress fits well in the chest area and is kind of loose in the bodice. The reason I am giving it a 3 out of 5 stars is due to the corset hoops.  They were not properly installed in the seem and immediately came loose, with one completely coming off the first time it was tried on.  I had to reinforce all of them so that the dress could be worn. I expected better quality sewing with how much it costed.

I was so worried because of the price I paid it would be cheaply made. I was so pleased to see how well it was made. I received so many compliments.  No one believed what I paid for it. My only wish is that I would have ordered a size smaller.

I’m 5’3” @ 220 lbs, 44dd and i was afraid to order to small, so i ordered a 3x and it fits comfortably. It is true to size and I would’ve ordered a 2x and would have been fine. Otherwise, its a lovely costume (purchased the silver) and i would definitely recommend this for wearing on Halloween, Renaissance Fairs or any type of party. Thank you LA
Great halloween costume. It is a little longer than I expected, so had to alter it slightly.

I will say that the fabric is gorgeous and it would be perfect except this is just made for a giant.  I am 5’4” and small in most places except my boobs and hips. I bought the XL because that’s what would be best with the corset style in the front and back. It did fit well when cinched up in the middle. However, the arms are ridiculous. I could fit at least two of my arms in there, and the part that should hit right under my elbow (it should start there) hits at my wrists, making the sheer part drag the floor when my hands are held at my waist. I could theoretically alter this and make it work, but it’s not worth the effort. I thought about trying the Large, but I’m afraid it would be too small around the middle with the corset ties—the effect wouldn’t be right—and I doubt there would be much difference in the arm length and width. I expected it to be too long. That’s not a problem. But the arms? A monkey’s arms aren’t that proportionally off!
